room_title: Escape room "Andromeda Station" by Escape Rhode Island in Providence
room_description: Upon returning from an away mission, you and your crew find the station in lock down and on the verge of total power failure. You manage to override the hangar bay doors, but that is as far as you make it before the computer re-engages the locks and you are trapped. Only the captainâ€™s authorization could have done this, but why..?
